attributes.action: GIVE SOME BACK TO MR & MRS AVERAGE WHO ARE LAW ABIDING, PAY TAXES AND WORK HARD. ALL WE DO IS PAYOUT FOR OTHERS TO BENEFIT SO ITS ABOUT TIME WE GOT SOMETHING.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE WORK HARD AND PAY OUR WAY AND GET NOTHING BUT BILLS,IE DENTAL TREATMENT ECT: YOU DO NOTHING AND GET EVERYTHING GIVEN, WELL IT'S ABOUT TIME THE AVERAGE WORKER GOT SOMETHING BACK A TAX FREE WEEK FOR EXAMPLE

rejection.details: Please resubmit without the excessive use of block capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
